process_dashboard_user_details.spoken_feedback: Welcome to Louie Voice! Now, you can fill your login details, with just voice commands!

process_confirm_first_name.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify name ?
process_confirm_first_name.help_command: Please say confirm or modify your name ?

process_ask_phone.spoken_feedback: Please speak your 10 digit phone number
process_ask_phone.help_command_alternate: Please speak your valid phone number

process_confirm_phone.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify phone number ?
process_confirm_phone.help_command: Please say confirm or modify phone number ?

process_modify_phone.help_command: please speak modified 10 digit valid phone number
process_modify_phone.help_command_alternate: Please speak your valid phone number

process_ask_pin_code.help_command_alternate: Please speak your 6 digit valid pin code

process_confirm_pin_code.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify pin-code ?
process_confirm_pin_code.help_command: Please say confirm or modify pin code ?

process_modify_pin_code.help_command: please speak modified 6 digit valid pin-code
process_modify_pin_code.help_command_alternate: Please speak your valid 6 digit pin code

process_confirm_email.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify your email ?
process_confirm_email.help_command: Please say confirm or modify email ?

process_ask_date_of_birth.spoken_feedback: Please speak your date of birth
process_ask_date_of_birth.help_command: speak your valid date of birth
process_ask_date_of_birth.help_command_alternate: Please speak your date of birth

process_confirm_date_of_birth.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify your date of birth ?
process_confirm_date_of_birth.help_command: Please say confirm or modify date of birth ?

process_modify_date_of_birth.help_command: please speak modified date of birth

process_confirm_gender.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify gender ?
process_confirm_gender.help_command: Please say confirm or modify gender ?

process_ask_city.help_command: speak your  valid city name from the list of city

process_confirm_city.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify city name ?
process_confirm_city.help_command: Please say confirm or modify city name ?

process_ask_education.help_command_alternate: Please speak your valid education from below options

process_confirm_education.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify education ?
process_confirm_education.help_command: Please say confirm or modify education?

process_modify_education.spoken_feedback: do you want to add some more education fields or want to remove selected education fields
process_modify_education.help_command: would you like to add or remove fields

process_add_education.spoken_feedback: please speak education fields again which would you like to add
process_add_education.help_command: please repeat education fields which would you like to add

process_remove_education.spoken_feedback: please speak education fields again which would you like to remove
process_remove_education.help_command: please repeat education fields which would you like to remove

process_confirm_last_name.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify last name ?
process_confirm_last_name.help_command: Please say confirm or modify last name ?

process_confirm_marital.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify marital-status ?
process_confirm_marital.help_command: Please say confirm or modify marital status ?

process_ask_state.help_command: speak your  valid state name from the list of state

process_confirm_state.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify state name ?
process_confirm_state.help_command: Please say confirm or modify state name ?

process_ask_country.help_command: speak your  valid country name from the list of countries

process_confirm_country.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify country name ?
process_confirm_country.help_command: Please say confirm or modify country name ?

process_ask_for_submit_or_modify_user_de.spoken_feedback: What would you like to modify name phone number or anything else ? or submit yours details
process_ask_for_submit_or_modify_user_de.help_command: would you like to modify any detail or say submit to submit the details

process_delete_yes_or_no.spoken_feedback: would u like to delete fund, yes or no

process_view_balance_or_bank_transfer.spoken_feedback: You can do bank transfer or check account balance?
process_view_balance_or_bank_transfer.help_command: Simply say: Transfer money. Or, Check account balance.
process_view_balance_or_bank_transfer.help_command_alternate: You can say: Transfer money. Or, Check account balance.

process_ask_payee_name.spoken_feedback: Please speak the name of the payee
process_ask_payee_name.help_command: Please speak the name of the payee
process_ask_payee_name.help_command_alternate: Please speak the name of the payee

process_ask_bank_transfer_yes_or_no.spoken_feedback: Would you like to do a bank transfer? Yes, or, No?
process_ask_bank_transfer_yes_or_no.help_command: Would you like to do a bank transfer? Yes, or, No?
process_ask_bank_transfer_yes_or_no.help_command_alternate: Would you like to do a bank transfer? Yes, or, No?

process_ask_amount.spoken_feedback: How much money would you like to send?
process_ask_amount.help_command_alternate: Please speak the amount you would like to send

process_confirm_transfer_details.spoken_feedback: Please say confirm or modify details ?
process_confirm_transfer_details.help_command: Please say confirm or modify details ?

process_check_for_modification_transfer.spoken_feedback: What would you like to modify? Payee name, Amount, or, Transfer Type?
process_check_for_modification_transfer.help_command: Modify: Payee name, Amount, or, Transfer Type?
process_check_for_modification_transfer.help_command_alternate: You can modify: Payee name, Amount, or, Transfer Type.

okay_get_that_going_silent.spoken_feedback: Okay, I get that. Going Silent

okay_no_worries_see_you_soon.spoken_feedback: Okay! No worries, see you soon
